channel.title: How Send Object Refresh For All Players?
channel.description:
I rlly dont think i,m gone get the anser from you guys but whateheck : how can i tell server.java that someone for example opened a door,so when someone is standing infront a door and someone opens it it opens for both.
it now only refreshes when the door goes to the position it is world spawned in but if someone changes the object it only changes it for that player.
